scripts.script: INSERT INTO @target.Js_UserDef ([JobSeekerID] ,[JS_Username],[Email] ,[PasswordHint] ,[PasswordAnswer] ,[LastVisit] ,[LastUpdated] ,[DateCreated] ,[NotificationType_cd] ,[firstName] ,[middleName] ,[lastName] ,[address1] ,[address2] ,[city] ,[stateID] ,[zip] ,[countryID] ,[homePhone] ,[alternatePhone] ,[oldPassword] ,[js_password] ,[lastPasswordChange] ,[failedLogins] ,[lastLoginFailure] ,[forcePasswordReset]) SELECT [JobSeekerID] ,[JS_Username],[Email] ,[PasswordHint] ,[PasswordAnswer] ,[LastVisit] ,[LastUpdated] ,[DateCreated] ,[NotificationType_cd] ,[firstName] ,[middleName] ,[lastName] ,[address1] ,[address2] ,[city] ,[stateID] ,[zip] ,[countryID] ,[homePhone] ,[alternatePhone] ,[oldPassword] ,[js_password] ,[lastPasswordChange] ,[failedLogins] ,[lastLoginFailure] ,[forcePasswordReset] FROM [@source].[dbo].[JS_UserDef] js WHERE js.JobSeekerID IN (SELECT DISTINCT JS_UserID FROM JS_MasterProfile)
